item.description:
Whether it's a garden-fresh tomato on a sandwich
or corn on the cob direct from the garden to
the stove, the tastiest vegetables come from the
home garden. Much enjoyment comes from producing
your own crisp vegetables, and it's an activity where everyone
in the family can contribute. But where do you
start? The best gardens come from careful planning and
winter is a good time to plan your garden. Join us to get
information about the essentials of planning a successful
vegetable garden. An experienced gardener from The
Natick Garden Club will talk about all the things to consider
when starting a garden and give us loads of useful
resources.
item.name: Planning a Vegetable Garden
